content: Question for v3 experts - is anyone actually using this? https://www.hl7.org/fhir/v3/ObservationValue/cs.html

Seems very odd to record demographic about a patient using Observation. Or am I misunderstanding how this might be used in FHIR?

And I have yet to encounter this in a CDA doc.
that's a grab bag of weird stuff. It's the sort of thing that should really be in LOINC Q&A
It is ABSOLUTELY used - at least the quality measure content is. It is central to quality measure reporting in the USA.
